messages.title: Correction and apology
messages.content: An election leaflet titled, 'Myth Busters: Our Lib Dem MP's Public Statements in Leeds vs Our Lib Dem MP's Voting Record in Westminster' was published incorrectly about the voting record of the Lib Dem MP, Mr Greg Mulholland. It stated he voted in favor of the 2010 Academy Act when he did not vote due to being on Paternity Leave at the time. This error was inadvertent, not due to malice. Apologies are extended for any confusion caused to voters.

contactInformation.address: Philip Coyne Labour Rooms, Nelson Street, Otley, LS21 1EZ

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet titled 'Myth Busters: Our Lib Dem MP's Public Statements in Leeds vs Our Lib Dem MP's Voting Record in Westminster' published by Leeds North West Labour on behalf of Mr Alex Sobel contained false information about Lib Dem MP Mr Greg Mulholland's voting record, mistakenly claiming he voted in favor of the 2010 Academy Act when he was on paternity leave and did not vote. Leeds North West Labour has issued a correction and apology for this error.
